subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Perjury
Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in the Roger Clemens perjury trial were concerned about a potential conflict of interest because his lead lawyer once represented Andy Pettitte, their key witness.
snippet: Prosecutors in the Roger Clemens perjury trial were concerned about a potential conflict of interest because his lead lawyer once represented Andy Pettitte, their key witness.
